course_title: ESL 511: Fundamentals of Graduate Writing II
class_notes: ELSP or a Graduate Program Administrator will enroll students in required ELSP courses. Contact your graduate PA (see https://www.gs.emory.edu/about/directors-staff.html) or Heather Boldt, Interim Director of ELSP, with questions or to enroll as an elective.
course_description: Designed to expand the written communication skills of international graduate students who have a basic understanding of effective academic writing from ELSP 510. The purpose of this course is to prepare students to write effectively with professional writing conventions displayed in research articles.
